name: TombSounds
description:
If the game won't play on your browser, you can download the executable below

_________________________________________________

You wake up only to see pitch black. You try to feel around you expecting to feel the soft texture of your bed, only to be met with with the cold hard exterior of the tomb floor. You know staying here is a bad idea, but how are you going to traverse the dark? 

You try to gaze into the abyss again, hoping that maybe this time something feasible would materialize, but instead you see a green line come from your being. It seems to outline what is around you. You decide to make use of this ability, to help you see in the dark. You decide to to take a step forward.

Come now the tomb awaits you.

Controls

WASD: Move character

Left Click: Fire a snap shot that displays more of your surroundings

Esc: Pause

Tips

  • Use the radar and your ears to help gauge where you are.
  • It is easy to get disorientated, so keep not your surroundings.
  • Don't be afraid to fire as many snapshots as you can, the more you can map out your surroundings the better chance you can make it out.
  • Watch out for ghosts...
